testcase.name: AC 1: Fleet User goes to products detail page when line change tariff plan is selected then the change tariff plan wizard is opened
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 1: Fleet User goes to products detail page when line change tariff plan is selected then the change tariff plan wizard is opened

testcase.name: AC 2: Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard then the previous tariff plan is shown and is not available in the options list
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 2: Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard then the previous tariff plan is shown and is not available in the options list

testcase.name: AC 3: Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard when fleet user switches the mobile plan the new plan is visible
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 3: Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard when fleet user switches the mobile plan the new plan is visible

testcase.name: AC 4.1: Fleet User chooses a tariff plan in the wizard when he chooses another one then the newest chosen tariff plan will be shown
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 4.1: Fleet User chooses a tariff plan in the wizard when he chooses another one then the newest chosen tariff plan will be shown

testcase.name: AC 4.2: Fleet User chooses a tariff plan in the wizard when he chooses the same one then the new tariff plan is removed
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 4.2: Fleet User chooses a tariff plan in the wizard when he chooses the same one then the new tariff plan is removed

testcase.name: AC 6: Fleet User chose a tariff plan in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then tariff plan is unselected again
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 6: Fleet User chose a tariff plan in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then tariff plan is unselected again

testcase.name: AC 8: Fleet User changes tariff plan in the wizard when he saves his changes then tariff plan is changed
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 8: Fleet User changes tariff plan in the wizard when he saves his changes then tariff plan is changed

testcase.name: AC 10: Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard then he can see the message that all prices are VAT excl
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan AC 10: Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard then he can see the message that all prices are VAT excl

testcase.name: Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard then the options of the previous plan are shown
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan Fleet User opens the change tariff plan wizard then the options of the previous plan are shown

testcase.name: Fleet User changes his tariff plan disconnected options will be shown of the previous tariff plan if present
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan Disconnected options Fleet User changes his tariff plan disconnected options will be shown of the previous tariff plan if present

testcase.name: Fleet User has disconnected options after changing the tariff plan when saving the changes then the warning message is shown with the amount of disconnected options
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan Disconnected options Fleet User has disconnected options after changing the tariff plan when saving the changes then the warning message is shown with the amount of disconnected options

testcase.name: Fleet User has disconnected options after changing the tariff plan when saving the changes and the user changes his mind then the confirmation screen is closed
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan Disconnected options Fleet User has disconnected options after changing the tariff plan when saving the changes and the user changes his mind then the confirmation screen is closed

testcase.name: should show error message when fleet user ordering is not enabled
testcase.classname: Line Change Tariff Plan Split bill guard checks should show error message when fleet user ordering is not enabled

testcase.name: should show error message when product is not of type SB20
